Title: Cherm
Actors: Petchtai Wongkamlao, Woranuch BhiromBhakdi, Siwa Traesang, Kuensit Suwanwatthakee
Plot: Moon-faced Sombat, a middle-aged taxi driver, usually works the night shift in Bangkok. He is an old-fashioned "straight arrow" and the greatest enjoyment in his lonely life is to listen to...
